name: Idle Horde
description:
The world has been invaded by dreadful monsters and titans! It needs a hero to bring peace to the land, and that hero is you! Create a powerful horde and conquer the world!
Embark on your quest and begin a simple, yet incredibly fun adventure.

【Features】
- Progress through thousands of levels to improve your skills
- Tap&Click to crush epic bosses and monsters!
- Hire and level up dozens of heroes, each with unique skills!
- Explore many adventure-filled empires with multiple monsters and titans
- Setup your heroes and let them fight while you are away
- Destroy damned monsters and titans in the dark dungeons to find even more gold
- Upgrade your main hero to grow even stronger!

【How to play】
Tap to attack monsters, hire and level up heroes to unlock their unique abilities. Murder monsters for gold, find treasure and explore new worlds.

Make your way through the dangerous lands by destroying insane titans and bloodthirsty monsters in this exciting endless idle game. Build the army of brave heroes, fight and win!
